SAMRAI::xfer

Locally-Active Data Communication Classes

These classes provide inter-patch communication functionality for problems where each data item may be defined on a unique set of patches on each patch level; i.e., the data is "locally-active". They are implemented in a generic fashion with respect to the actual structure of the data involved in the communication procedures.
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataCoarsenAlgorithm
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataCoarsenPatchStrategy
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataCoarsenSchedule
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataCoarsenTransactionFactory
  • SAMRAI::xfer::StandardLocallyActiveDataCoarsenTransactionFactory
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataRefineAlgorithm
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataRefinePatchStrategy
  • SAMRAI::xfer::LocallyActiveDataRefineSchedule
